text: Hot Rod is a 2007 American comedy movie directed by the first time director Akiva Schaffer and starring Andy Samberg, Jorma Taccone, Bill Hader, Danny R. McBride, Isla Fisher, Sissy Spacek, Ian McShane, Will Arnett. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. == Other websites == * * Category:2007 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Akiva Schaffer Category:Movies set in British Columbia
title: Hot Rod (movie)
